titleEN: Glow In The Dark Body Paint
content: Become the focal point of the next concert or rave you attend by giving yourself an eye-catching look using this glow in the dark body paint. This premium quality paint dries quickly for your convenience and begins to glow extra bright when placed under UV lighting.

Keep your drinks frosty and the party bumping all day by keeping your beverages in this light up drink cooler. It features a fully insulated body to ensure the temperature stays cool and built-in LEDs so you can keep going after the sun sets.

titleEN: 52 Things To Do While You Poo Book
content: Make your time on the porcelain throne a little more entertaining by going in with the 52 Things To Do While You Poo book. It features a range of enthralling poop related activities and factoids put together by excretion expert Hugh Jassburn for your enjoyment.

Improve your driving experience by ushering your vehicle into the digital age with the smartphone heads up display system. This revolutionary accessory fits discreetly on the dashboard and works with almost any smartphone to provide real time driving information.

Perform bushcraft tasks long after the sun goes down with ease by using this LED knife. Apart from its razor sharp 3.5 inch steel blade, the handle comes lined with small LEDs that shine bright to provide visibility around your work/stabbing area.

Get to know the stranger and lesser known heroes of the comic book world in detail by going through the pages of the League Of Regrettable Superheroes. It comes chock-full of illustrations of heroes like “Bee-Man” and “The Eye” along with their full backstories.

Make the traveling process go as smoothly as possible on your next trip by packing your stuff into this revolutionary carry-on luggage. It features a built in charging station along with all terrain wheels while still meeting airline requirements for carry-on luggage.

Ensure you can get a life-saving fire going when the going gets tough by using this emergency fire starter kit. This helpful kit  comes in a compact, waterproof lighter-like case that includes the essentials – like waxed tinder sticks and a flint wheel.

Tackle any environment mother nature throws your way by heading out wearing a pair of these ultimate slip-on athletic shoes. They’re available in a range of vibrant color combinations and feature a water draining design that allows for excellent ventilation.

Amuse yourself and others around you by passing the time playing with these brainwave cat ears. Each pair of furry cat ears employs state of the art brainwave technology – so they’ll move in real time based on your emotions.

Turn heads as your cruise down the road with your bike decked out in this LED light kit. Each ultra thin strip is extremely flexible for easy installation and can be controlled from a remote to glow in one of sixteen different colors with dimming and fading effects.

Look like the most fashionable smoker in your circle when you go to light your cigarette with this lipstick lighter. Disguised as a chic polka-dot lipstick, this refillable butane lighter is the obvious choice for any fashion forward smoker.

Clean fruits and vegetables instantly without making a mess by placing them inside this removable strainer bowl. This dishwasher safe bowl features a built in strainer that reduces 60% of the water needed to wash food compared to traditional methods.

Transform your desk into a mouth-watering Asian style buffet with these sushi erasers. This novelty set of erasers comes shaped like colorful sushi rolls on a little four inch serving tray that keeps them organized when they’re not in use.

Discourage your gluttonous co-workers from stealing your delicious lunch by placing it inside this anti-theft moldy sandwich bag. This reusable bag comes with a funky-looking mold design to create the appearance your fresh lunch is past its expiration date.

Make your fancy new phone nearly indestructible by placing it inside the all weather protective iPhone case. The sleek design gives you full access to your phone’s features while protecting it against everything from water to dirt to shocks and drops.

Keep your next formal event from getting too stuffy with help from these champagne shotgun glasses. Rather than calmly sip your drink like a responsible adult, the chambong lets you chug down your drink faster than a frat pledge during a hazing ceremony.

Ensure your day starts off on a purrrfect note by animating your breakfast using this cat shaped egg mold. It’s made entirely from durable food-safe silicone and features a fun design that turns your eggs into a cheerful little cat with two big yellow eyes.

Treat everyone around you to a free concert as you unapologetically blast your favorite tunes from this wireless Bluetooth 360 degree speaker. It features a 65 foot Bluetooth range and is designed with a compact waterproof body ideal for any outdoor activity.

Receive an extra jolt of energy while you chow down by making your PB&J’s using this caffeinated peanut butter. Made from all natural ingredients, this excellent protein source slowly releases caffeine into your system for sustained energy throughout your day.

Ensure your small ember becomes a roaring fire with help from this firestarting blow straw. This metallic bellow comes in a sleek telescopic design that extends twenty inches outward so you can blow oxygen into the campfire without melting your face off.

Cut out the middle man and begin making your own delicious soda from the comfort of home using the Keurig carbonated drink machine. This modern marvel works without a CO2 canister and makes a perfectly portioned eight ounce glass of your favorite soda pop.

Get your fix of caffeine on the go with these delicious chewable coffee cubes. These gummy candy edibles pack the distinct flavor and energy boost of real coffee – so you can stay energized even when you don’t have your fancy lattee machine nearby.

Marvel at the majesty of our galaxy by gazing at the detailed images found in the “Hubble Space Telescope Photos” book. Its pages treat your eyes to stunning ultra high-resolution images of the most remarkable deep space images ever to be captured.

Capture the perfect selfie with your pooch by outfitting your phone with the dog selfie smartphone attachment. The design takes advantage of your dog’s natural draw to a tennis ball to achieve the nearly impossible task of getting them to look directly into the camera.

The folding Wayfarer glasses make it remarkably easy to store your shades when they’re not being worn. The classic Wayfarer plastic frame features additional hinges at the front and sides that make it possible to fold them up into a compact package.

Don’t call a contractor – now you can fix cracks with ease using this driveway asphalt repair kit! This foolproof DIY kit will cover cracks for years, so you can help restore your home’s curbside appeal without breaking the bank.

titleEN: Light Up Learn To Play Keyboard
content: Learn how to play the piano faster than ever by sitting down in front of the light up learn to play keyboard. It features 100 built-in song bank and sound presets and comes with 61 lighted keys designed to make the piano learning process fun and interactive.

Stay warm and look fashionable like a true Pokemon master would with this Pikachu hoodie. This bright yellow hoodie comes styled like the famous little electric type Pokemon complete with face and ears on the hood.

Light up practically any type of environment safely and easily using this versatile string light system. This USB powered lighting system glows 10-20 times brighter than average Christmas string lights, and can be mounted to virtually anything you can find.

Get a barbershop quality shave from the comfort of home by using this heated shaving cream dispenser. The machine heats up the gel to just the right temperature to provide a close and smooth shave that won’t leave the skin feeling irritated afterwards.

Give your humble abode some charming Autumn accents using this metal pumpkin luminary. It comes with a hollowed out body so you can place either a light or candle inside and is made from rust resistant galvanized steel.

Give yourself a dose of nostalgia while you quench your thirst by drinking out of these jazz paper cups. Each cup comes with a wet wax coating to provide enhanced rigidity and features the classic purple and teal design that was popularized in the ’90s.

Avoid accidentally hitting wildlife while driving by equipping your ride with this thermal night vision system. This reliable unit gives you superb visibility in total darkness by relaying crisp clear images to the screen in front of you.

Become the premiere bootlegger in your hometown by using this 10 gallon moonshine still. Handcrafted from copper, each piece comes professionally soldered and can be used for distilling a variety of spirits like whiskey and good old white lightning.

Fulfill your childhood dreams of becoming an intergalactic smuggler by taking command of the Millennium Falcon quadcopter. While it may not do the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs, it does feature 4 balanced rotors and can be controlled up to 200 feet.

Cum prepared by planning a <del>romantic date</del> sex filled evening with <del>your significant other</del> a stranger you met 10 minutes ago on Tinder like any self respecting millennial would by bringing along these Netflix And Chill condoms!

You have a job interview at 1pm, a wedding at 4pm, and a cross country track meet at 8pm – what do you wear, hotshot? The tuxedo tracksuit, of course! This elegant two piece ensemble looks as distinguished as any tailored tux at a fraction of the price!

Keep your phone going long past its initial charge when out in the wild by packing this portable solar powered charger. It folds into a compact  unit for easy storage and is both shockproof and waterproof so it can be used in a number of harsh environments.

Just when you thought you experienced every way to clog your arteries – bacon jam hits the shelves. This sweet and salty treat is made with real bacon and comes in a variety pack that lets you try three distinct variations such as black pepper, red chili, and original.

Become the ultimate playground soldier by building the weapon of your dreams using this modular NERF gun. The motorized NERF Modulus ECS-10’s flexible base lets you choose from thirty different gun attachments, such as a chainsaw and a blast shield.

Perform any random task the day throws at you with the greatest of ease using this Leatherman style multi-tool. This handy tool will fit comfortably in your pocket and features a multitude of tools including a bottle opener, knife, and spring assisted scissors.

Quit counting calories and indulge a little by scarfing down this entire one pound bag of marshmallows. This ginormous bag comes chock full of colorful little marshmallows ideal for snacking on – or for topping onto your baked goodies.

Use your downtime productively at work by creating tiny vapor rings using this vapor blaster gun. The blaster features a vibrant translucent neon green casing and fires off safe/non-toxic water rings up to twelve feet away.

Do you love explosions, kittens, laser beams, and sometimes goats? The Exploding Kittens card game is a cat themed version of Russian Roulette where the objective is to avoid drawing the exploding kitten card and be the last man standing.

Travel around the city without having to lug around a cumbersome lock by riding on the bicycle seat lock. The cleverly designed seat can be pulled off the bicycle and extended to form a one meter long chain that you can use to lock your bike.

Keep your man bits fresh while on the go by making sure you carry some flushable wipes for dudes. The wipes feature a huge 44 square inch surface and contain vitamin E and soothing aloes that are perfect for cleaning any part of the body – especially the balls.

Spook guests that step into your restroom using this shadowy figure shower curtain. It comes with rings that make it easy to hang and creates the illusion someone is lurking behind the curtain while they’re trying to do their business.

Protect your furry friend when traversing over rugged terrain by putting him in these pet trekking boots. They not only look stylish and fit comfortably, but safeguard against abrasive surfaces and help insulate the paws against extreme temperatures.

Turn a day at the pool into a soaking wet intergalactic battle with the water gun spaceship float. Once fully inflated, this brightly colored spaceship provides comfortable seating for its pint-sized pilot and comes with a deadly mounted water squirt gun.

Track your stats just like the professionals do when you ball it up with the smart basketball. It works on any regulation hoop and tracks things like makes, misses, and field goal percentage so you can hone your skills and improve your game.

titleEN: Baby Up In This Bitch Car Decal
content: Make people take notice of your precious cargo by getting their attention with the “Baby Up In This Bitch” car decal. It’s styled like the popular “Baby On Board” signs but with a more impactful and humorous statement that’s sure to get a big reaction from drivers.

Instantly locate misplaced items with help from this Bluetooth connected tracking device. Simply attach the coin sized pad to your wallet, keys, or anything you commonly lose and it will help you locate your lost item instantly using a downloadable app.

Illuminate the Dark Side of your room like any loyal Imperial would using this Death Star mood light. Apart from its unrivaled firepower, it emits a white glow that won’t strain the eyes, and measures seven inches across so it fits comfortably on any nightstand.

Kill two birds with one stone by charging your smartphone while you cook dinner on the portable thermoelectric generator. This handy pot works over any heat source and is designed to convert heat to electricity – making it ideal for camping.

Bring the cultural phenomenon of emojis from the digital to the physical world by wearing one of these emoji masks. These one size fits all masks are made out of durable plastic and come shaped like some of the most commonly used emojis around.

Give your man cave a vintage ’50s feel to it by mounting this pink Cadillac shelf. This icon of automotive history provides a sturdy small glass top to place your stuff and is styled after Elvis Presley’s iconic 1954 pink Cadillac.

Two juggernauts of the breakfast world have finally joined forces to bring your bacon flavored coffee! These premium slow smoked beans are bathed in maple bacon so you enjoy the delicious bacon flavor without all the grease and calories.

Transform any shoe into a comfortable slip-on using this innie shoelace fastener. These easy to install fasteners can be adjusted to any length, are compatible with any lace type – eliminating the need for having to constantly tie and untie your laces.

Commemorate your favorite Sci-Fi saga of all time with these Star Wars collectible stamps. The selvage includes the iconic movie logo with an intergalactic battle scene backdrop while the stamps display the artwork of famed Star Wars poster artist Drew Struzan.

Wreck This Journal is for anyone who’s ever wanted to start chronicling their life but didn’t know how to start. Its pages are filled with a prompts like “collect dead bugs here” and “place sticky things here” leaving you with a battered journal full of character when you finish.

Convert your trusty vehicle into a mobile hangout spot using this hammock for Jeeps. Capable of holding up to 350 pounds, this saltwater resistant cover installs in minutes and can be used as either a place to sit or store stuff when the top is down.

Ensure your presentation goes off without a hitch by displaying it using this wireless HDMI device. Rather than deal with cables and connectivity issues, this device allows you to share your screen wirelessly with very low latency.

Put your well balanced breakfast on display for the world to see by documenting it with the selfie stick spoon. This purple spoon extends over 30 inches and includes a remote so that you can capture the magic as it happens. #selfiespoon

Turn your best kicks into wall art for all to enjoy by putting them on display on this wall mounted shoe rack. Besides helping to keep the room tidy, the ingenious design allows for multiple racks to seem like a single strip in order to save space.

Stop devouring processed crap and start eating like a healthy individual by following the recipes in the Thug Kitchen cookbook. This foul-mouthed read cuts right to the chase by showing you how to cook healthy and simple plates from scratch without wasting time.

Pay homage to the best Sci-Fi saga of all time by listening to your tunes out of these Star Wars headphones. They feature 40mm professionally tuned drivers that deliver incredible sound from the Star Wars themed frames.

Turn your iPad into a portable desktop computer instantly using this spillproof iPad keyboard. The slender design fits easily in your backpack or purse, while the durable fabric skin over the keys protects it from spills, crumbs, and other minor drops.

Become the ultimate builder in LEGO history by learning the ins and outs of the trade from this LEGO Builder’s Guide book. You’ll learn everything from how to construct models that won’t fall apart to how to create photo mosaics and curved sculptures.

Stop digging through your entire toolbox looking for the right tool – all you need is this multi-tool pocket knife handy at all times. This Swiss made tool is crafted from top quality stainless steel and features a linerlock mechanism that gives it an ultra compact shape.

Indulge in a little junk food without feeling guilty by spending the day wrapped around this doughnut pool float. This delectable looking floating inflates to 4 feet wide and features an eye-catching and mouth-watering design of a bitten chocolate doughnut with sprinkles.

Conquer any task you encounter in the outdoors single-handedly using this 4-in-1 woodsman multi-tool axe. This extraordinarily versatile tool features a stainless steel blade and can be used as either a bow saw, mallet, stake puller, or stand alone axe.

Conquer the trails like a champ when you head into the great outdoors wearing these Nike Air Mowabb OG shoes. They feature a sturdy rubber sole, a neoprene interior bootie construction, and are perforated to enhance breathability while on the move.

Exercise the mind and body as you try to best your opponent playing on this giant chess set. Made from tough all-weather resin, the board is designed to easily snap together piece by piece so you can take it apart and transport it anywhere.

Awe at the beauty of a full moon every night by lighting up your room with this moon shaped lantern. This gorgeous lantern emits a soft golden glow ideal for accent lighting in any room and comes in seven different sizes.

Ensure Rex has a spot to relieve himself in the event that you get stuck at work with this faux grass pet toilet. This synthetic mat is made to look and feel like real grass while the layers beneath help absorb odors and other fluids so cleanup is easy and mess free.

Become the coolest kid in <del>the galaxy</del> school when you show up wearing this Darth Vader 3D molded backpack. Lord Vader’s ominous and iconic mask is recreated in the contours – making this the ultimate school accessory for any Star Wars fan.

Transform your driver’s seat into a personal dining room/mobile office with a little help from this attachable steering wheel table. It’s designed to be used when the car is parked and features a smooth surface ideal for writing or eating.

Nothing says you’re a true fan like putting yourself through constant agony watching your team trying to triumph. The disappointing Cleveland sports moments book captures all these instances and adds commentary to each gut-wrenching piece of history.

Start up your car without ever setting foot inside of it using this automobile GPS/remote start system. Apart from tracking your car’s location, it allows you to use your smartphone to effortlessly turn it on without having to look around for your keys.

Liven up your workstation by showing off your geeky gamer side with these Tetris shaped sticky notes. Why settle for boring and played out Post-its when you can have vibrant colors and different shapes you can play with during the day?

titleEN: Heating And Cooling Car Seat Cushion
content: Achieve maximum comfort while traveling from point A to point B by outfitting your ride with the heating and cooling car seat cushion. No matter what the weather is like, this cushion will ensure your body remains at the perfect temperature while you drive.

Capture all your adrenaline pumping moments with help from this iPhone helmet adapter. This low profile cam adapter for iPhones features a wide angle lens ideal for capturing first person point of view footage and can be mounted on vented helmets.

Got something to say? Get your message across in a mouth-watering way with this alphabet silicone tray. All 26 letters of the alphabet come printed on 3 silicone trays that are oven safe up to 500 degrees so they can be used to make warm treats or quirky ice cubes.

Survival is all but guaranteed when you walk into the wild armed with this monster bowie knife. This Rambo approved weapon comes with a sturdy easy to grip handle and a 10 inch stainless steel blade – with both a smooth and serrated edge for maximum versatility.

Keep your kids from being afraid of the dark<del>side</del> by installing this Star Wars BB-8 3D night light in their room. This little battery powered droid appears as if he’s broken through the wall to bring in a little geeky ambient lighting.

Maximize every nook and cranny in your home to the fullest by increasing your storage space with this behind the door cabinet. The brilliant design is completely portable and comes with an assortment of fixed and adjustable shelves.

Save bundles by repairing old and broken cables with this self setting rubber. This miracle rubber can be easily molded by hand, cures overnight at room temperature, and bonds to all kinds of everyday items like steel, glass, wood, and aluminum.

Bring a little nostalgia and humor to your morning by serving your milk out of this milk carton glass. Made from tempered glass, this unique glass is dishwasher safe and styled to look like those small milk cartons we all drank from in school.

Reinvent the world’s most popular sport by challenging your friends to a game with this six foot tall soccer ball. This behemoth is made from durable white and black vinyl and is extremely lightweight when fully inflated, allowing it to be kicked up into the air with ease.

Help your children keep their pigsty of a room looking a little cleaner by encouraging them to put away their dirty laundry with this hamper basketball hoop. It comes with a removable laundry bag that lets them shoot them articles of clothing like balls into a hoop.

Help meal preparation go off without a hitch with help from this compact food preparation set. Each bowl in the set comes with wide handles for easy gripping and is designed to fit within one another like a Russian nesting doll to save on space.

titleEN: Big Bad Book Of Bill Murray
content: Get your fill of Bill by following his fascinating career and life in the Big Bad Book Of Bill Murray. It provides insight into every facet of the beloved icon from his early days in SNL to his blockbuster days, all the way up to his re-invention as a hipster icon.

Make your dream of owning a classic car a reality without plunging yourself into debt with this LEGO Volkswagen Beetle Kit. Modeled after the iconic 1960 Charlotte model, it features realistic components like an opening trunk, hood, and doors.

Enjoy an old favorite in a brand new way by hitting the water with this Nintendo controller pool float. Once inflated, this geeky float transforms into a cool five foot long NES controller ideal for showing off your gamer roots while you cool off under the hot sun.

Technology has evolved once again – now you can carry an incredible 200 gigabytes in a storage device smaller than your fingernail. It has the ability to hold over 20 hours of HD footage, making this the world’s highest capacity micro SD card.

Avoid burning your fingers upon retrieving your toast by placing it inside this handy toaster basket utensil. The heat resistant steel cage fits into the toaster slot so you can easily retrieve your toast or pastry while you hold on to the cool plastic handle.

Wave goodbye to unsightly sweat marks when the heat is on by wearing one of these underbust sweat absorbers. This cotton stuffed garment fits comfortably under the bra to absorb moisture and keep your skin from getting irritated while keeping your garments dry.

Turn the mundane task of pool cleaning into a fun game using this remote control pool skimmer. This battery powered vessel can operate for 5 hours on a single charge and comes with a 100 foot R/C range so you can travel throughout the entire pool.

Ensure your bow stays secure as you trek through unpredictable and rugged terrain by mounting it onto the hunting bow backpack. The lashing straps and extendable pocket accommodate various sized bows, allowing you to keep your hands free.
